parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post includes a CMF number: "CMF: 11240002". This strongly suggests electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions the PNL (National Liberal Party) and encourages voters to vote for "position 4" on the ballot, implicitly referring to PNL candidates for the parliamentary elections.  The image further reinforces this by showing several PNL candidates. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE. This is a paid Facebook post targeting Argeș County, aiming to reach a wide audience. The use of hashtags and the call to action ("Votează echipa PNL Argeș") clearly indicates an attempt to influence public opinion on a large scale. This fulfills the criteria of "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters in Argeș County to vote for the PNL candidates. The phrase "Votează poziția 4 pe buletinul de vot!" ("Vote for position 4 on the ballot!") is a direct call to action aimed at influencing the electoral outcome. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a promotional piece advocating for a specific political party and its candidates, not an unbiased presentation of information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct appeal for votes for the PNL.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>946445580660803</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post is a clear case of electoral propaganda. It contains a CMF number, directly promotes the PNL party and its candidates, encourages voting for a specific position on the ballot, targets a wide audience in Argeș County through a paid Facebook advertisement, and aims to influence the electoral outcome.  There is no journalistic element present; it's purely promotional. The post violates Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, fulfilling all criteria for electoral propaganda.  The fact that it was posted after the official campaign period ended (as indicated by the end_date) further strengthens the case for a violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>ALIN CĂLINESCU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>MIHAI COTET</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>ILIE BOLOJAN</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>ALINA GORGHIU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>RADU PERIANU</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Alina Gorghiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 946445580660803) cu conținut electoral, care promovează Partidul Național Liberal (PNL) și îndeamnă la votarea poziției 4 pe buletinul de vot, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidaților PNL din Argeș. Postarea, care include un număr CMF (11240002) și imagini cu candidați PNL, constituie material de propagandă electorală conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, fiind interzisă după încheierea campaniei electorale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
